Pharmacopeia_Formula: Shen Ying Yang Zhen Dan (Spirit Response Nourish Vitality Pill)

Answer: The key distinguishing feature is the Exterior Wind with Toxic-Heat pattern, requiring specific treatment with points like LI11 (Quchi).

Pharmacopeia_Formula: Ma Chi Xian He Ji (Purslane Combination)
